name: Graffiti Groovin'
summary: Boyfriend is on his way to meet up with Girlfriend for a date they've planned for weeks, when out of nowhere a "bunny-like" girl approached him and challenged him to a rap battle, "Whoever wins gets all the money of the other!", she said. Boyfriend accepts the challenge and bets the money he had for the date.

videos.name: Trailer
videos.title: Friday Night Funkin': Graffiti Groovin' - Release Trailer
